metadata.title: CVE-2022-4462 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.8 before 15.7.8, all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.4, allversions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.2. This vulnerability could allow auser to unmask the Discord Webhook URL through viewing the raw APIresponse.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
